verse: That night I had a sixth vision. I looked up and saw a large scroll flying.
The heavenly messenger who had been talking with me went out. It was time for a seventh vision.
Suddenly, the basketâ€™s lead cover was lifted, and I saw a woman inside. She seemed to want out.

Then in this vision, I looked up and saw two women moving forward with wings resembling the wings of storks. With the power of the wind in their wings, they lifted the basket up to a place somewhere far away, between heaven and earth.
